comic2-1050.jpg.description: Unusually, the image is a JPEG rather than a PNG. It's because the image contains a steganographic message encoded with steghide (https://steghide.sourceforge.net; web UI at http://futureboy.us/stegano/decinput.html). The message is a green monochromatic photo of a T-Rex sculpture saying "boooooooooooooners".

comic2-2087.png.description: The transcript reads the panels normally, left-to-right, but this particular comic should be read right-to-left: panels 3, 2, 1, 6, 5, 4
